original_text: Take care that you do not neglect the Levite as long as you live in your land.
korean_text: 너는 삼가 네 땅에 거주하는 동안에 레위인을 저버리지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: Take care that you do not neglect the Levite
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 레위인을 소홀히 하지 않도록 주의하라

sentences.original_text: as long as you live in your land.
